Rank.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 8% and its mana cost by 10%.
Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 16% and its mana cost by 20%.
Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 24% and its mana cost by 30%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 5%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 10%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 15%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 20%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 25%.
Increases the damage bonus of Contaminate by 5%.
Increases the damage bonus of Contaminate by 10%.
Increases the damage your Feared enemies can take before breaking the effect by 2% of their Maximum Health.
Increases the damage your Feared enemies can take before breaking the effect by 4% of their Maximum Health.
Increases the damage your Feared enemies can take before breaking the effect by 6% of their Maximum Health.
Your spell casts have a 2% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100% and mana cost by 40%. Can occur once every 3 seconds at most.
Your spell casts have a 4% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100% and mana cost by 40%. Can occur once every 3 seconds at most.
Your spell casts have a 6% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100% and mana cost by 40%. Can occur once every 3 seconds at most.
Your spell casts have an 8% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100% and mana cost by 40%. Can occur once every 3 seconds at most.
Your spell casts have a 10% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100% and mana cost by 40%. Can occur once every 3 seconds at most.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 3% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 6% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 10% of your target's Resistances.
Increases your maximum health by 2%.
Increases your maximum health by 4%.
Increases your maximum health by 6%.
Increases your maximum health by 8%.
Increases your maximum health by 10%.

Ability.Description: Deals 410 Death damage whenever the enemy uses an ability. Can occur up to 5 times. Lasts 15s.

Rank.Description: Neddra's Grasp
Increases the damage of Draining Bolt by 5% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases the damage of Draining Bolt by 10% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.

Ability.Description: Deals 1072 to 1185 Death damage, healing the Mage for 30% of the damage done.

Rank.Description: Draining Bolt

Ability.Description: Deals 944 to 1043 Death damage after 8s. If a damage over time effect is cleansed from the enemy, Neddra's Torture explodes dealing 1227 to 1356 Death damage to the cleanser and silencing them for 3s.

Rank.Description: Reduces the global cooldown of your damage over time abilities to 1.25 seconds and their mana cost by 16%.
Reduces the global cooldown of your damage over time abilities to 1 second and their mana cost by 33%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 3%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 9%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 12%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 15%.

Ability.Description: Spreads Dark Touch and Neddra's Grasp to up to 6 additional enemies.

Rank.Description: Radiate Death
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 2%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 4%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 6%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 8%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 10%, in addition to their normal effects.
Neddra's Essence
Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 20%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 20%, the amount healed to 12% of the damage done and the duration by 2 second.
Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 40%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 40%, the amount healed to 14% of the damage done and the duration by 4 seconds.
Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 60%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 60%, the amount healed to 16% of the damage done and the duration by 6 seconds.
Gives your Primary Bolt abilities a 50% chance to refresh the duration of Life Leech on the enemy.
Gives your Primary Bolt abilities a 100% chance to refresh the duration of Life Leech on the enemy.
Gives your Radiate Death a 33% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Combust, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Gives your Radiate Death a 66% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Combust, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Gives your Radiate Death a 100% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Combust, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Increases your Void Bolt and Void Barrage damage by 2% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt and Void Barrage damage by 4% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt and Void Barrage damage by 6% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt and Void Barrage damage by 8% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt and Void Barrage damage by 10% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.

Ability.Description: Refreshes all of the Mage's active Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
